title: MODERN CONVENIENCES & ENTERTAINMENT!
posting_body: ['1 Bedrooms starting at $1,651', '2 Bedrooms starting at $2,131', 'School Bus Stop, Gated Entrance, Picnic Area, Business Center, Maid Service, Electric Car Chargers, Door To Door Trash Pickup, Free Wifi Areas, Handicap Modified Units, Outdoor Grills, Pool, Game/Sport Room, Bus Stop, Dog Park, Fitness Center, Club House, Furnished Units, Elevators, Community Parking Garage', 'Custom Carpet, Hi-Speed Internet, Private Patios/Balconies, High Ceilings, Ice Makers, Premium Countertops, Cable Ready, Miniblinds, Walk-In Closets, Frost Free Refrigerators, W/D Machines, Garbage Disposals, Microwaves, Intrusion Alarms, Non-Carpeted Flooring, Ceiling Fans, Garden/Large Tubs, Premium Appliances, Dishwashers, Self Cleaning Ovens', '1 Source Apartment Locators', 'Top Rated locator service with 500+ Five star reviews.', 'OUR SERVICE IS FREE!', 'We can help with Second Chance on Select Properties (Broken Leases, Property Debt, Evictions, Bankruptcy, Felonies and Misdemeanors)', 'Free Move or Cash Rebate on all qualifying properties', 'PHONE: 2.1.4.3.9.6.6.7.6.8', 'TEXT: 9.7.2.5.4.4.4.4.5.7', 'Refer To Apt#5124A']
